findings.details: Reading progress bar is visual only; add ARIA progressbar and dynamic value updates for assistive tech.
Spot-checked recent content links; no obvious 404 placeholders detected in templates.
WebSite and BlogPosting metadata present; improvements focus on accessibility rather than SEO metadata gaps.
Readable typography and hierarchy; remaining work is incremental accessibility polish.

recommendations: Expose reading progress to assistive technologies via ARIA progressbar + live value updates
Continue incremental accessibility improvements for interactive UI elements
